items.title: Invariant Recognition Memory Spaces for Real-World Objects Revealed With Signal-Detection Analysis
items.author: Igor Utochkin, Daniil Azarov, Daniil Grigorev
items.content: <article>Psychological Science, Ahead of Print. Recognition memoryrefers to the process of distinguishing between previously experienced and novel events. Apart from the objective quality of stored memories, recognition depends on the retrieval context produced by all items (foils) presented together ...</article>
